Package ohos.agp.text

Class Layout

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.agp.text.Layout
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    RichTextLayout, SimpleTextLayout

    public abstract class Layout
extends Object
    Represents an abstract class that manages text layout in visual elements on the screen. This class is implemented by SimpleTextLayout and RichTextLayout.

    For simple text, use SimpleTextLayout; for rich text with multiple forms, use RichTextLayout.

    Since:
    3

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      protected long mNativeLayoutHandle
      Indicates the pointer to the C++ native layout object.

      • drawHighlight

        public void drawHighlight​(Canvas canvas,
                          Path HighlightPath,
                          Paint highlightPaint,
                          int offSetInVertical)
        Draws text on a specified Canvas object with the given highlight paint and by following the highlight path drawn between the background and the text.
        Parameters:
        canvas - Indicates the Canvas object.
        HighlightPath - Indicates the highlight path.
        highlightPaint - Indicates the highlight paint.
        offSetInVertical - Indicates the offset to temporarily translate the canvas when rendering the highlight.
        Since:
        3

      • getTop

        public int getTop​(int line)
        Obtains the top of a specified line.
        Parameters:
        line - Indicates the specified line.
        Returns:
        Returns the top if obtained; returns -1 if the value of line is invalid; returns the bottom of the last line if the value of line is equal to the line count obtained via getLineCount().
        Since:
        3

      • getCoordinateInSecondDir

        public float getCoordinateInSecondDir​(int offset)
        Obtains the secondary horizontal position of a specified text offset. It is where a new character will be inserted in the direction other than the paragraph's primary direction.
        Parameters:
        offset - Indicates the text offset.
        Returns:
        Returns the secondary horizontal position of the specified text offset.
        Since:
        3
